templates.name: AI/ML Professional Template
templates.subject: Application for AI/ML Engineering Internship - {{COMPANY_NAME}}
templates.content:
Dear {{HR_NAME}},

I hope this message finds you well.

I am Karrtik Gupta, a third-year Electronics and Communication Engineering student specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I am reaching out to express my strong interest in joining {{COMPANY_NAME}} as an AI/ML Engineering Intern for a 6-month tenure beginning in 2026.

Throughout my academic journey and hands-on project experience, I have developed strong expertise in:

• Generative AI: Architected production-ready AI agents using Gemini API and Node.js, including "VoiceCart" and "AI Summary Pro," automating complex workflows and enhancing user experience

• Computer Vision: Trained and optimized custom YOLOv8 models achieving 92% mean Average Precision (mAP) for real-time object detection applications

• Full-Stack Development: Built scalable web applications using React, Node.js, Express, and Firebase, handling authentication, real-time data synchronization, and RESTful APIs

• Cloud Computing: Deployed and validated machine learning models on Microsoft Azure, managing end-to-end ML project lifecycles

• Programming: Proficient in Python, C++, and JavaScript with strong foundations in Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object-Oriented Programming

I have enclosed my resume for your review, and you may also view my portfolio at kartikgupta.vercel.app for detailed project demonstrations.


I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your organization's goals. Please let me know if there is a convenient time for a conversation.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to your response.

Best regards,
Karrtik Gupta
+91 9821726242
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/karrtik-gupta/
Portfolio: karrtikgupta.vercel.app

templates.name: SDE Professional Template
templates.subject: Application for Software Development Engineer Internship - {{COMPANY_NAME}}
templates.content:
Dear {{HR_NAME}},

I hope this email finds you well.

I am Karrtik Gupta, a third-year engineering student with a strong passion for full-stack software development. I am writing to express my interest in the Software Development Engineer Internship opportunity at {{COMPANY_NAME}} for a 6-month period beginning in 2026.

I have gained substantial experience building scalable, production-ready applications, and my technical expertise includes:

• Backend Development: Designed and implemented robust server-side architectures using Node.js and Express.js, building RESTful APIs that serve over 2,000+ active users with optimized performance and security

• Frontend Development: Created responsive, intuitive user interfaces using React, focusing on real-time data synchronization and exceptional user experience

• Database Management: Experienced with both NoSQL (Firebase Firestore) and SQL databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL), implementing efficient data models and queries

• Cloud & DevOps: Deployed applications on Microsoft Azure with experience in containerization (Docker) and version control (Git/GitHub)

• Programming Fundamentals: Strong command of C++, Python, and JavaScript with solid understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, and Database Management Systems

My enclosed resume and portfolio (karrtikgupta.vercel.app) provide comprehensive details about my projects and technical accomplishments.

. I am eager to bring my technical skills, problem-solving abilities, and enthusiasm to your engineering team.

I would be grateful for the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to {{COMPANY_NAME}}'s success. Please let me know if you would be available for a conversation at your convenience.

Thank you very much for considering my application. I am look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
Karrtik Gupta
+91 9821726242
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/karrtik-gupta
Portfolio: karrtikgupta.vercel.app

templates.name: General Professional Template
templates.subject: Engineering Internship Application - {{COMPANY_NAME}}
templates.content:
Dear {{HR_NAME}},

I hope you are doing well.

My name is Karrtik Gupta, and I am a third-year engineering student specializing in Electronics, Communication, and Artificial Intelligence. I am writing to inquire about potential internship opportunities at {{COMPANY_NAME}} for 2026.

I have developed strong technical skills through academic coursework and practical project implementations:

• Software Development: Full-stack web development using React, Node.js, Express, and Firebase
• Machine Learning: Experience with computer vision, generative AI, and model deployment
• Programming: Proficient in Python, C++, and JavaScript
• Cloud Technologies: Hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure
• Core Competencies: Data Structures, Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, and Database Management

I am impressed by {{COMPANY_NAME}}'s innovative work and would be honored to contribute to your team. I have attached my resume for your review, and my portfolio can be viewed at kartikgupta.vercel.app.

I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my skills and enthusiasm align with the needs of your organization. Please let me know if you would be open to a conversation.

Thank you for taking the time to consider my application. I look forward to your response.

Warm regards,
Karrtik Gupta
+91 [Your Phone Number]
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/karttik-gupta
Portfolio: kartikgupta.vercel.app
